attributes.action: Raise in parliment the injustice resulting from Darren Fletcher having no avenue for appeal against his red card in the UEFA Champions League semi-final which will result in him being suspended for the final.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Darren Fletcher performed a perfectly legal tackle during the Champions league semi-final which was incorrectly judged by the referee. He now has no avenue for appeal against the red card meaning he will miss the final. The rules of FIFA should be called into question in parliament.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
